channel.name: Bad Omen (Hexaghost card) - Daily Discussion 18 Dec

messages.content:
Next Daily Discussion: #deleted-channel

__Votes__:
The Art of Slime War (event): 6
Murder Strike (Champ card): 3
Overexert (Slime Boss card): 0

embeds.title: Bad Omen
embeds.description:
Rare Skill / 1 :energy_hexa: / The Hexaghost / Downfall

Apply 16 (24) **Soulburn** :p_soulburn:.
Increase amount of turns for it to detonate by 1.
**Exhaust**.

messages.content: dear lord this thing is crap

embeds.title: Burning Touch
embeds.description:
Common Skill / 1 :energy_hexa: / The Hexaghost / Downfall

Apply 7 (11) **Soulburn** :p_soulburn:, twice if the enemy
has **Soulburn** :p_soulburn:.

messages.content: applies a comparable amount of soulburn in COMMON
and also increasing soulburn detonation time is really bad
me when sear applies 14 soulburn for free and doesn't ruin the whole point of soulburn

so now:
how would we make this card not crap
what if it reduced it by 1?
step through decks can remove the inferno
and in long fights you can remove the the bolster
phantom fireball is already a thing, and most people believe it to be crap
but its rare and that's where niche cards tend to go
new bad omen is just bad

embeds.title: Flames from Beyond
embeds.description:
Uncommon Skill / 2 :energy_hexa: / The Hexaghost / Downfall

**Ethereal**. **Afterlife.**
Apply 18 (24) **Soulburn** :p_soulburn: to ALL enemies.

messages.content: just double the soulburn applied by this card it would be moderately funny
Even the game knows it sucks
It has bad in the name

Honestly I think an interesting way it could be changed is to leave this alone, but have maybe 1-2 other methods of INCREASING the SB timer, and have some slightly better payoffs for it have make a weird archetype of soulburn stacking
ah yes the fat heat shield definitely a thing
I think it would at least be funny
heat crush and <rare soulburn lose hp>

embeds.title: Searing Wound
embeds.description:
Rare Skill / 1 :energy_hexa: / The Hexaghost / Downfall

ALL enemies lose HP equal to their Soulburn.
â€‹~~- **Exhaust**. -~~

messages.content: This card just doesn't make any sense, especially at rare. Increasing the number of turns for soulburn to detonate is really bad, and the amount it applies isn't really that impressive to start with. I really think this concept should be scrapped entirely and be replaced with something to help fill a underserved niche/role for hexaghost. This could be the right place for a block scaling mechanism aside from radiant flames.
I think it should be "whenever you play a collected card, gain 1 strength", but cost 3
it would be cool to have a power like "whenever a ghostflame is extinguished by the inferno ghostflame, gain 7 block"
actually thats really unviable without TheCard, so something else likely
whenever a gf is extinguished gain block sounds fine actually
would incentivize cards like <again> <spectral spark> and retract to some degree

embeds.title: Again!
embeds.description:
Common Skill / 1 (0) :energy_hexa: / The Hexaghost / Downfall

**Ignite** the current Ghostflame, then **Extinguish** it.

embeds.title: Spectral Spark
embeds.description:
Uncommon Skill / 0 :energy_hexa: / The Hexaghost / Downfall

If possible, **Extinguish** the current Ghostflame to gain 1 (2) **Intensity** :p_intensity:.

messages.content: itâ€™d have to have high numbers though because extinguishing is a lot harder than igniting
